resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/108241</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>108241</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206960</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Journey Through Hallowed Ground: Travel through Virginia's Piedmont</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reise Durch Geheiligten Boden: Spielraum 
durch Piedmont Virginias</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Voyage Par La Terre Sanctifiée : Voyage par
Piémont de la Virginie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Viagem Através Da Terra Hallowed: Curso 
através de Piedmont de Virgínia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Viaggio Attraverso Terra Hallowed: Corsa 
attraverso il Piemonte della Virginia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ταξίδι μέσω του καθαγιασμένου εδάφους: Ταξίδι 
μέσω piedmont της Βιρτζίνια</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Viaje A través De la Tierra Santificada: 
Recorrido a través de Piedmont de Virginia</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">visits 65 historic places along 75 miles of Route 15 in Virginia's Piedmont. Stops include homes of Thomas Jefferson and James Monroe; sites of some of the bloodiest battles in the Civil War; and other places that evoke the soldiers, statesmen, farmers, and slaves who fought, toiled, and governed there.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Besuche 65 historische Plätze entlang 75 Meilen 
von Weg 15 in Piedmont Virginias. Anschläge schließen Häuser 
von Thomas Jefferson und von James Monroe ein; Sites von einigen
der blutigsten Schlachten im Bürgerkrieg; und andere Plätze, 
die die Soldaten, die Staatsmänner, die Landwirte und die Sklaven 
erwähnen, die kämpften, abgeplagt und dort geregelt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">visites 65 endroits historiques le long de 75 
milles de l'itinéraire 15 dans Piémont de la Virginie. Les 
arrêts incluent des maisons de Thomas Jefferson et de James 
Monroe ; sites de certaines des batailles les plus sanglantes 
dans la guerre civile ; et d'autres endroits qui évoquent les 
soldats, les hommes d'État, les fermiers, et les esclaves qui ont 
combattu, travaillés fort, et régis là.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">visitas 65 lugares historic ao longo de 75 milhas 
da rota 15 em Piedmont de Virgínia. Os batentes incluem HOME de
Thomas Jefferson e de James Monroe; locais de algumas das 
batalhas as mais sangrentas na guerra civil; e outros lugares 
que evoke os soldados, os statesmen, os fazendeiros, e os escravos que
lutaram, labutados, e governados lá.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">chiamate 65 posti storici lungo 75 miglia 
dell'itinerario 15 nel Piemonte della Virginia. Gli arresti 
includono le sedi di Thomas Jefferson e di James Monroe; luoghi 
di alcune delle battaglie più sanguinanti nella guerra civile; 
ed altri posti che evocano i soldati, gli statisti, i 
coltivatori e gli schiavi che hanno combattuto, lavorati duramente e 
governati là.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">επισκέψεις 65 ιστορικές θέσεις κατά μήκος 75 
μιλίων της διαδρομής 15 piedmont της Βιρτζίνια. Οι 
στάσεις περιλαμβάνουν τα σπίτια του Thomas Jefferson και 
james Μονρόε  περιοχές μερικές από τις πιό αιματηρές 
μάχες στον εμφύλιο πόλεμο  και άλλες θέσεις που προκαλούν 
τους στρατιώτες, τους πολιτικούς, τους αγρότες, και τους σκλάβους 
που πάλεψαν, κοπίασαν, και κυβέρνησαν εκεί.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">visitas 65 lugares históricos a lo largo de 75 
millas de la ruta 15 en Piedmont de Virginia. Las paradas 
incluyen hogares de Thomas Jefferson y de James Monroe; sitios 
de algunas de las batallas más sangrientas de la guerra civil; 
y otros lugares que evocan a los soldados, a los estadistas, a 
los granjeros, y a esclavos que lucharon, trabajados, y gobernados 
allí.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206960</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>108241</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/journey-through-hallowed-ground-travel-through-virginias-piedmont</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
